summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley running east and west in the block between Hamlin Street and the old Government Canal right of way, from East Park Drive to Montlake Boulevard, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 8116 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds".
